message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. I'm sure you'll love it. I'm offering it to you for $150.  Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $130 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $140.  This is a great deal, and I'm sure you won't regret it!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $140 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $135?
